articles.title: Trade Deal Removes Major Hurdle for Rally in Apple and Tech - The New York Times
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's limited trade deal with China removes a major hurdle for Apple and other technology stocks that have already surged this year to record highs.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 edged up 0.01% on Friday to close at its second record high in two days, while Apple rose 1.36% to an all-time high. Chip stocks including Qorvo and Advanced Micro Devices sold off from recent record highs.
"I wouldn't be surprised to see som… [+1656 chars]

articles.title: Large Hospital System Says It Was Hit by Ransomware Attack
articles.description: EDISON, N.J. — New Jersey’s largest hospital system said Friday that a ransomware attack last week disrupted its computer network and that it paid a ransom to stop it. Hackensack Meridian Health did not say in its statement how much it paid to regain control …
articles.content:

articles.author: Ivan Penn
articles.title: California Governor Rejects PG&E’s Restructuring Plan
articles.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom’s opposition is the latest hurdle for the utility, which is seeking to resolve a complex bankruptcy and take part in a state wildfire fund.
articles.content: On Thursday, PG&E filed an amended reorganization plan with the federal Bankruptcy Court, after reaching a $13.5 billion settlement with wildfire victims. The utility needed to reach that deal to escape bankruptcy by a state imposed deadline of June 2020 … [+1215 chars]
